mapper.select: SELECT s.sch_no, c.cns_no, c.cns_nm, c.ofc_no, LEFT(GET_CD_NM('CO0020', cns_field), 2) AS cns_field, sch_ymd, sch_hr, (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM caply a WHERE a.sch_no = s.sch_no) AS sch_state FROM cschedule s JOIN counselor c ON s.cns_no = c.cns_no

SELECT s.sch_no, c.cns_no, c.cns_nm, c.ofc_no, LEFT(GET_CD_NM('CO0020', cns_field), 2) AS cns_field, sch_ymd, sch_hr, (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM caply a WHERE a.sch_no = s.sch_no) AS sch_state FROM cschedule s JOIN counselor c ON s.cns_no = c.cns_no WHERE c.cns_no = #{cns_no}
SELECT uno, cns_no, cns_nm, LEFT(GET_CD_NM('CO0020', cns_field), 2) AS cns_field, ofc_no, uemail FROM counselor JOIN user ON uno = user_no WHERE left(cns_field, 2) = 'P1' ORDER BY cns_field, cns_no
SELECT cns_no, cns_nm, LEFT(GET_CD_NM('CO0020', cns_field), 2) AS cns_field, ofc_no, uemail FROM counselor JOIN user ON uno = user_no WHERE uno=#{user_no} AND left(cns_field, 2) = 'P1'
SELECT code, ccnm FROM commoncode WHERE `div` = 'CO0010'
